column3: >The Ken’s is a multi-purpose WordPress theme with top tier graphics and flagship performance. Its ultra-fast backend is equipped with a robust admin panel and the Page Composer. Ken comes with a next-level interface, tons of associated templates, magnificent Artbees Edge Slider, full-height capable page sections, multiple header styles, killing WooCommerce shop and eye catching animations. All of which are supercharged to sport a modern website in no time. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider size="120"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth="true" attached="true" padding="3"][vc_column width="1/3" border_color="#eeeeee"][mk_padding_divider size="40"][mk_icon_box style="style7" rounded="false" icon_frame="true" icon_align="top" title="TONS OF READYMADE TEMPLATES" icon="theme-icon-folder-2" icon_color="#ff667a" p_line_height="24"]In case you need to build and setup your site within less than minutes, you can chose one of our pre made standard pages. Within The Ken's lifetime template repository, we have included 30+ handcrafted page templates with different layouts, color schemes, sections, sliders and shortocdes for different purposes.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" border_color="#eeeeee"][mk_padding_divider size="40"][mk_icon_box style="style7" rounded="false" icon_frame="true" icon_align="top" title="MODERN DESIGN . TRENDY LOOK" icon="theme-icon-love" icon_color="#fec418" p_line_height="24"]The Ken is designed with latest trends and design practices in mind. Full-height page section, eye-catching animation, one-half layouts, video capabilities, modern Parallax, scrollers and multiple header scenarios are only some of which you can use to create a remarkable website with latest trends in no time.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" border_color="#eeeeee"][mk_padding_divider size="40"][mk_icon_box style="style7" rounded="false" icon_frame="true" icon_align="top" title="EXCLUSIVE ONE-PAGE COLLECTION" icon="theme-icon-file" icon_color="#49e845" p_line_height="24"]In case you need to build and setup your site within less than minutes, you can chose one of our pre made standard pages. Within The Ken's lifetime template repository, we have included 30+ handcrafted page templates with different layouts, color schemes, sections, sliders and shortocdes for different purposes.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][mk_page_section bg_image="http://artbees.net/themes/ken/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/photo-bigger.png" attachment="fixed" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_stretch="true" parallax="true" parallax_direction="vertical" speed_factor="0.3" bg_video="no" video_mask="false" video_opacity="0.6" padding="20" full_height="false" full_width="false" layout_structure="half_right" bg_color="#f4f6f5" mask="false" mask_opacity="0.6"][vc_column width="1/1"][mk_padding_divider size="100"][mk_fancy_title style="avantgarde" tag_name="h3" size="50" color="#222222" font_weight="300" letter_spacing="0" font_family="none" margin_bottom="10" align="center" line_height="60" border_width="5"]Responsive[/mk_fancy_title][mk_padding_divider size="40"][vc_column_text]

>Thanks to its fluid grid system, Ken is still the same beautiful ‘The Ken’ on your every possible viewport all the way down to your iPhone! We have tuned the layout, shortcodes, sliders and every element to meet the highest responsive standards. In The Ken, Not only icons but also images and every single element support Retina quality. The Ken is designed with Retina devices in mind. Your website graphics are ultra-sharp and preserve pixel perfection in all your Retina displays and screens. >The combinations you can create by the shortcodes, blog/portfolio styles and the page section along with tons of associated page templates has turned The Ken into a suit that lets you easily bring any vision on screen. column2: RETINA FRIENDLY" icon="theme-icon-cellphone" animation="left-to-right" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]Thanks to its fluid grid system, Ken is still the same beautiful ‘The Ken’ on your every possible viewport all the way down to your iPhone! We have tuned the layout, shortcodes, sliders and every element to meet the highest responsive standards.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="TOP TIER GRAPHICS" icon="theme-icon-image" animation="left-to-right" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]Your website enjoys a sleek perfection embodied in a unique and simple user interface. Use full-height slider and sections, plethora of  shortcodes and readymade templates to create an ideal website in minutes.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="RICH ICONOGRAPHY" icon="theme-icon-hamburger" animation="left-to-right" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]Within The Ken, you will enjoy a rich collection of icons on Retina quality to use across your your website. We have included FontAwesome premium collection as well as a small set of line icons handcrafted by folks at Artbees.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="COLOR WIDGET &amp
column3: 6 CUSTOM WIDGETS" icon="theme-icon-portfolio" animation="left-to-right" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]With Integrated accent color palette you can save and quickly swap between any number of color palettes. The Ken includes 6 custom built-in widgets Portfolio, Contact Form, Contact Info, Testimonial Slider, Twitter, Flickr Feed.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="MODERN DESIGN . TRENDY LOOK" icon="theme-icon-macbook" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]Full-height page section, modern viewport animation, video section and sliders, Parallax stripes, Swipers and sticky menu are only some of which you can use to create a remarkable website with latest trends in no time.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="EXCLUSIVE ARTBEES EdgeSlider" icon="theme-icon-accordion" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]The Ken is bundled with the best of its kind slider to the day. EdgeSlider can fit to your viewport height automatically and is enriched by eye-catching animations, video capability and responsive performance.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="ULTRA FAST BACKEND " icon="theme-icon-commandconsole" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]In The Ken, design is amplified by a clean and valid code. Thanks to our robust admin panel, you will experience a responsive and super fast backend experience enriched by next-level code and organized design.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="WooCommerce SHOP" icon="theme-icon-cart" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]The Ken builds you an eye-catching modern shop with a unique interface. Cart, login, account, checkout and order pages are no more an cluttered mess of texts and forms! and are perfectly crafted as for a high end shopping website.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mk_icon_box style="style2" title="FULL-HEIGHT PAGE SECTIONS" icon="theme-icon-crop" animation="left-to-right" read_more_txt="DETAILS" read_more_url="#"]Together with EdgeSlider, full-height page sections will give you the power to create amazing one-page layouts. The Ken’s page sections support horizontal and vertical parallax movements, and both MP4|WEBM video formats.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_divider style="dashed" divider_color="#cccccc" divider_width="full_width" margin_top="60" margin_bottom="40"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth="true"][vc_column width="1/1"][mk_padding_divider size="85"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="TONS OF READYMADE TEMPLATES" icon="theme-icon-folder-2" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]In case you need to build and setup your site within less than minutes, you can choose one of our pre made standard pages. The Ken's template repository includes 50+ handcrafted page templates for every purpose.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="PLETHORA OF SHORTCODES" icon="theme-icon-calendar" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]Tabs (vertical and horizontal), Accordion, Callout, Testimonial Slider, Buttons, Image &amp
column4: Gallery, Clients Slider, Translucent Pricing And Data tables, Icon box, Audio player, Milestone, Progress bars, Slideshows, Employee, ...[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="Exclusive! iDevice Mockup Collection" icon="theme-icon-fax" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]The Ken is bundled with Artbees iDevice Mockup collection from Graphicriver. Crafted with trendy flat look and no-rival pixel perfection, this item can be used to stunningly showcase your screenshots, apps and websites in high-res.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="NEXT-LEVEL PAGE META" icon="theme-icon-file" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]The Ken, provides you with a wide -yet quick- range of customization possibilities within page and blog meta options. As a modern practice we have turned many of page meta options into shortcodes to reduce server load.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="RICH ICONOGRAPHY" icon="theme-icon-hamburger" animation="left-to-right"]Within The Ken, you will enjoy a rich collection of icons on Retina quality to use across your your website. column5: STICKY HEADER" icon="theme-icon-bottom-bigger" animation="left-to-right"]The Ken’s mega menu can Organize large sets of menu links within 1-6 menu columns . Associated to The Ken’s beautiful header and Menu, is a sticky header with swift performance and smooth transition.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="SHORTCODE VISIBILITY" icon="theme-icon-cellphone" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]To keep the maximum perfection in all viewports, you can define different designs for different resolutions by this option. Using visibility options in EdgeSlider you can make your slides will not look ugly in handhelds.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="DASHBOARD &amp
column6: CROSS-CANVAS WIDGETS" icon="theme-icon-file" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]The Ken has a wigetable dashboard. In The Ken, all the widgets look always beautiful. Unlike many other themes, The Ken’s widgets are designed and styled to look flawlessly great on both dark and light canvases.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="FLUID &amp
column7: AUTO ADAPTIVE" icon="theme-icon-ipad" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553"]Using the fluid grid system, The Ken always uses maximum available width of the screen to display content. Happily, The Ken can be displayed the best way on your iPad both in portrait and landscape viewports.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="EXCLUSIVE ARTBEES EdgeSlider" icon="theme-icon-accordion" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553"]The Ken is bundled with the best of its kind slider to the day. EdgeSlider can fit to your viewport height automatically and is enriched by eye-catching animations, video capability and responsive performance.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="ELEGANT TYPOGRAPHY" icon="theme-icon-quote" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" icon_align="left"]The Ken offers an awesome set of font to use. With 600+ (and counting) free and customizable Google fonts you will represent a decent typographic beauty across your website.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="FUTURISTIC BLOG &a

column2: PORTFOLIO" icon="theme-icon-text" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" icon_align="left"]With 2 blog styles and 4 portfolio styles you can add a modern and sleek look to a wide range of post types (image, gallery, video, self-hosted audio and Soundcloud) which look seamlessly awesome both in every layout.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="PAGE COMPOSER" icon="theme-icon-thermostat" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" icon_align="left"]We have tuned the world’s #1 top-selling Drag&amp
column3: Drop page composer to make it even more efficient. You can create simple blogs with ordinary content or heavy duty websites with nested columns and complex array of shortcodes.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="BOXED AND FULLWIDTH LAYOUT" icon="theme-icon-gallery" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" icon_align="left"]The Ken is capable of both fullwidth and boxed layouts. For your boxed layout, you can define a solid color or upload an image. Portfolio, Client, Employee and Image Gallery shortcodes can be used as fullwidth scrollers.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="HELPFUL DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT" icon="theme-icon-user" animation="left-to-right" icon_color="#ff4553" icon_align="left"]Our documentation covers any and each point you need to know during the work so you will never be locked out of your work. Artbees premium-class customer support forum is there to help you with your problems at any step.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="VAST RANGE OF POSSIBILITIES" icon="theme-icon-layers" animation="left-to-right"]The combinations you can create by the shortcodes, blog/portfolio styles and the page section along with tons of associated page templates has turned The Ken into a suit that lets you easily bring any vision on screen.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="PERSONALIZE AS DESIRED" icon="theme-icon-shirt" animation="left-to-right"]Thanks to our extensive options and settings both in admin panel and meta options as well as tons of page templates, you will have nothing but everything needed to create unlimited different layouts.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="RETINA READY" icon="theme-icon-macbookair" animation="left-to-right"]The Ken is designed with Retina devices in mind. Your website graphics are ultra-sharp and preserve pixel perfection in all your Retina displays and screens. All icons, images and every single element support Retina quality.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="POWERFUL ADMIN PANEL" icon="theme-icon-chergerfull" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]Artbees most advanced admin panel is a host of brand-new features and user-centered development. Thanks to our robust admin panel, you will experience a responsive and fast backend experience enriched by next-level code.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="MODERN VIEWPORT ANIMATIONS" icon="theme-icon-voicemessage" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]If you’re bored with similar viewport animations, you have now a roundup of new viewport and loop animation to apply to elements: spin, horizontal and vertical flip and float, scale, rotate, tossing, pulse, etc.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="FULL DEMO CONTENT" icon="theme-icon-tick" animation="left-to-right" icon_align="left"]To create and lunch your website instantly, The Ken is packed with all of the pages and posts you see inside the demo. You can instantly use the existing content, quickly tweak or mix them to fit the best in your website.[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style1" title="SEO OPTIMIZED &amp
column4: MULTI-LINGUAL READY" icon="theme-icon-search" animation="left-to-right"]The Ken meets highest SEO standards. column3:
>You can add a gorgeous visual experience by using Full-height page section with parallax movement and video capability. Together with EdgeSlider, page sections will give you the power to create amazing one-page layouts. The Ken’s page sections support horizontal and vertical parallax movements and modern video formats (WebM, MP4, OGV)

>The Ken is bundled with the best of its kind slider to the day. EdgeSlider can fit to your viewport height automagically and is enriched by eye-catching animations, video capability and responsive performance. >Together with EdgeSlider, page sections will enable you to create amazing one-page layouts. The Ken’s page sections support and vertical and horizontal parallax and modern video formats. column4: >With two blog styles and four portfolio styles you can add a modern and sleek look to a wide range of post types (image, gallery, video, self-hosted audio and Soundcloud). column6: accordion styles and tabbed Post widget are some of the great shortcodes we added to The Ken V 2.0.[/mk_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][mk_icon_box style="style7" rounded="false" icon_frame="true" icon_align="top" title="BLOG MAGAZINE AND 6 OTHER STYLES" icon="theme-icon-blog" icon_color="#66cfbe" p_line_height="23" animation="fade-in" icon_size="small"]You can now create magnificent magazine blogs by using the newly added Magazine blog style or choose from other 6 brand new blog styles introduced in V 2.0 (Tile,  Modern, Thumbnail, Slideshow, scroller, list)[/mk_icon_box][mk_icon_box style="style7" rounded="false" icon_frame="true" icon_align="top" title="HD SCREENCASTS . column7: >Choose from 8 different styles for your blog.
